text: The Boys Next Door is a 1985 American adventure crime drama movie directed by Penelope Spheeris and starring Charlie Sheen, Maxwell Caulfield, Christopher McDonald, Hank Garrett, Patti D'Arbanville, Moon Unit Zappa, Phil Rubenstein. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 adventure movies Category:1985 crime drama movies Category:1980s serial killer movies Category:1985 LGBT movies Category:American adventure movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Penelope Spheeris Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: The Boys Next Door (1985 movie)
